70 /* Error Codes */
71 typedef enum
72 {
73  OV_SUCCESS = 0,
74  OV_ERROR_UNKNOWN = -1,
75  OV_RESPONSE_MISMATCH_ERROR = -2,
76  OV_RESPONSE_FLAG_ERROR = -3,
77  OV_RESPONSE_CLASS_ID_ERROR = -4,
78  OV_RESPONSE_CMD_ID_ERROR = -5,
79  OV_RESPONSE_DATA_PACKET_SIZE_ERROR = -6,
80  OV_RESPONSE_INVALID_PARAM = -7,
81  OV_RESPONSE_OUT_OF_RANGE_PARAM = -8,
82  OV_RESPONSE_OUT_OF_RANGE_FWID = -9,
83  OV_RESPONSE_UNKNOWN_ERROR = -10,
84  INVALID_INPUT = -11,
85  INVALID_GPIO_RESPONSE = -12,
86  OV_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD_ERROR = -13,
87  OV_FIRMWARE_FILE_OPRATION_ERROR = -14,
88  OV_SMALL_BUFFER_SIZE = -15,
89 
90 }ov_status_code_e;
91 
95 typedef struct vstream_getinfo
96 {

98  ov_u32 v_nxt_pkt_size;
99  ov_u32 v_frame_timestamp;
100  ov_u32 v_frame_number;

102 
103 }ov_vstream_info_s;

155 typedef enum sensor_frequency
156 {

158  V_50HZ,
159  V_60HZ
160 
161 }ov_v_scc_freq_e;
162 
163 /* V Config */
164 typedef struct ov_v_config
165 {
166  ov_v_scc_freq_e frequency;
167  ov_u8 brightness; /* Level value 0~6 */
168  ov_u8 contrast; /* Level value 0~4 */
169  ov_u8 saturation; /* Level value 0~4 */
170  ov_u8 flip; /* Value 0: Normal, 1:flip */
171  ov_u8 mode; /* Value 0: Normal, 1:night mode */
172 
173 } ov_v_config_s;
174 
178 typedef enum audio_format
179 {
180  A_PCM,
181  A_ADPCM,
182  A_ULAW = 0x05
183 
184 }ov_a_format_e;
185 
189 typedef enum audio_samplerate
190 {
191  /* Response Packet format is correct */
192  A_44K,
193  A_32K,
194  A_24K,
195  A_16K,
196  A_12K,
197  A_11K,
198  A_8K
199 
200 }ov_a_samplerate_e;
201 
202 /* A Config */
203 typedef struct ov_a_config
204 {
205  ov_a_format_e format;
206  ov_a_samplerate_e sampleRate;
207 
208 }ov_a_config_s;

448 /*
449  * Note: Below 'ov_<name>' functions shall be registered w/ their corresponding
450  * functions implemented in fs_if.*.
451  *
452  * These functions are to program the OV firmware.
453  */
